nodes.text: Glory Support was a vignette written by Peter Schweighofer, and was published in the Shadows of the Empire Sourcebook.

Chief, the Chief Technician for Rogue Squadron, worked on the heating unit's reactor for the makeshift Rebel base on Zhar's moon Kile. Meanwhile, she contemplated her plan to betray the Rebel Alliance and her squadron by helping the Black Sun assassinate Luke Skywalker.
